body_html: Any other ideas ? @apaszke Or is putting a flag in and letting the user decide the best idea ? I guess we could have a default flag set to alias_multinomial if n_sample is too large and not otherwise and the user would still have the chance to change it .
body_text: Any other ideas ? @apaszke  Or is putting a flag in and letting the user decide the best idea ? I guess we could  have a default flag set to alias_multinomial if n_sample is too large and not otherwise and the user would still have the chance to change it .
body: Any other ideas ? @apaszke  Or is putting a flag in and letting the user decide the best idea ? I guess we could  have a default flag set to `alias_multinomial` if `n_sample` is too large and not otherwise and the user would still have the chance to change it .
